description.plain: Swedish electronic pop duo State of Sound debuted in 2016 with “Higher Love,” a downtempo cut that introduced their mix of breezy tropical house and romantic dance-pop. Formed in Stockholm by friends Viktor Norén and Joakim Andrén, the new group kept the lush summer vibes rolling with subsequent singles “Wake Up Where You Are,” “Love Me Like That,” and “Dry the Rain,” blending gently pulsing electronic rhythms with smooth vocals and occasional acoustic instrumentation. ~ Timothy Monger

body.plain: Swedish electronic pop duo State of Sound debuted in 2016 with “Higher Love,” a downtempo cut that introduced their mix of breezy tropical house and romantic dance-pop. Formed in Stockholm by friends Viktor Norén and Joakim Andrén, the new group kept the lush summer vibes rolling with subsequent singles “Wake Up Where You Are,” “Love Me Like That,” and “Dry the Rain,” blending gently pulsing electronic rhythms with smooth vocals and occasional acoustic instrumentation. ~ Timothy Monger

songs.lyrics:
5 ContributorsWake Up Where You Are Lyrics[Verse 1]
Never thought that I would love again
Never thought I'd see the end of grain
Now I know I gotta get away
I need to kill the pain
Wanna see what's on the other side
Gotta know that there is more to life
Come along and open up my eyes
I wanna see the fire

[Pre-Chorus 1]
I'm calling for you desperately
To save me and be my remedy
And take me to a better place
And come with me

[Chorus]
We are young, on the run
Let the love free your mind
We can be who we are
Like we never will die
When the sun's coming up
We'll be higher than stars
And I wanna wake up where you are

[Verse 2]
Hold me close and never let me go
Wanna dance until the high runs out
We're not ready for the afterglow
So hit me one more time
If tomorrow ever gets me down
Gotta keep on being on the run
'Cause I wanna live without a line
Between the moon and sun
You might also like[Pre-Chorus 2]
Release me, kill my misery
And redirect my destiny
We're heading for a better day
So far away

[Chorus]
We are young, on the run
Let the love free your mind
We can be who we are
Like we never will die
When the sun's coming up
We'll be higher than stars
And I wanna wake up where you are

And I wanna wake up where you are

[Break]

[Chorus]
We are young, on the run
Let the love free your mind
We can be who we are
Like we never will die
When the sun's coming up
We'll be higher than stars
And I wanna wake up where you are
And I wanna wake up where you are3Embed

songs.full_title: Love Me Like That by State of Sound
songs.title: Love Me Like That

description.plain:
MUMBAI: Stockholm duo State of Sound has released their single ‘Love Me Like That’ a track written by the duo themselves, Viktor Norén and Joakim Andrén.
“We wrote ‘Love Me Like That’ in the middle of the cold and dark Swedish winter dreaming about sunshine, palm trees, and endless summer nights. If a song is a party, then this is our vision of the ultimate after party. A feeling of no tomorrow, perfect romance and a cinematic ending at the beach watching the sunset,” State of Sound says about the track.
‘Love Me Like That’ is the follow up single to the duo’s successful track ‘Wake Up Where You Are.’
State of Sound members Viktor Norén and Joakim Andren met and became friends immediately in 2010 at a tequila party in their home of Stockholm, Sweden. With Viktor’s background in the bands Sugarplum Fairy and Viktor and The Blood and solo adventure Viktorious and Joakim’s past as tour musician and songwriter, it was a musical match made in heaven. After several years of bonding over music, Viktor and Joakim formed a vision and framework for their own musical project, which they named State of Sound.

Their debut single ‘Higher Love’ was released in January 2016 and the song quickly climbed the charts and was Gold certified in Sweden and now has over 14 million streams on Spotify.

7 ContributorsLove Me Like That Lyrics[Verse 1]
Devil's eye
Burning fire bringing me to life

We're gonna party like in '99
Everybody's stayin', we'll be leavin', we don't need 'em

I'll be drippin' 'til we're out on the other side
And you whisper, gonna take you to a place
Where we can be alone and live like we never die

Cause when you love me like that
I know I'll never go back

You and I
We communicate with chemistry, need no sound
